content: This is for informational purposes only, and does not represent the views of nor is affiliated with Discord Inc., nor any of its staff.
Made with <3 by @%MAINTAINER_HANDLE%.
%SITE_VERSION% | Data Updated: <c-timestamp unix=%DATA_LAST_UPDATED%>...</c-timestamp>
NOTE: This was for Discord Staff (and their personal accounts), Partners, Verified Server Owners, and some server owners with a certain revenue threshold.
There is not much information for begun or completed times. It is believed that around approximately:
-> <c-timestamp unix="1684269420">...</c-timestamp> - Discord Staff and their personal accounts got the rollout.
-> <c-timestamp unix="1684438920">...</c-timestamp> - Partners, Verified Server Owners, and the some server owners got the rollout.
[...] Rollout begun with February 2015.
[...] Rollout was considered completed with February 2016 (Nitro) and August 2015 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Rollout begun with March 2016 (Nitro) and September 2015 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Rollout was considered completed with October 2016 (Nitro) and October 2015 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #1 begun with January 2017 (Nitro) and November 2015 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #1 ended off with multiple confirmed reports of up to February 2017 (Nitro).
[...] Wave #2 begun with multiple confirmed reports of up to November 2017 (Nitro) and December 2015 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #2 had multiple confirmed reports of up to January 2016 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #2 ended off with November 2017 (Nitro) and January 2016 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #1 begun with a massive jump to December 2018 (Nitro).
[...] Wave #1 had multiple confirmed reports of up to February 2016 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #1 ended of with multiple confirmed reports of up to January 2019 (Nitro) and March 2016 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #2 begun and ended with multiple confirmed reports of up to June 2020 (Nitro) and July 2016 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #2 ended off with June 2020 (Nitro) and July 2016 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #1 begun and ended with February 2022 (Nitro) and October 2016 (Non-Nitro).

[<c-timestamp unix="1686339535">...</c-timestamp>] It was at this time we realized the rollout seems to be giving Non-Nitro users the change, flipping what was going on with Nitro users where they never got any rollout.
[...] Wave #2 begun early, starting off with February 2022 (Nitro) and October 2016 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #2 had multiple confirmed reports of up to December 2016 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Wave #2 had multiple confirmed reports of up to November 2022 (Nitro).
[...] Wave #2 had some reports - yet unconfirmed due to its rarity - of up to February 2023 (Nitro).
[<c-timestamp unix="1686347074">...</c-timestamp>] It was at this time we realized Wave #2 started giving access to Nitro users who subscribed after the March 1st cutoff access to the update.
[...] Wave #2 ended off with December 2022 and January 2017 (Non-Nitro).
[...] Thanks to two users who spotted some more January/February Nitro users around ..., we can now confirm up to February 2023 (Nitro).
We're unsure if this will happen over the weekend or on Monday. Check back reguarly to see any updates!

faq.header: When will I get my username?
content: There is no official timeline. This is to only provide a overview of what is going on currently.
Confirmed as of <c-timestamp unix="1686163919">...</c-timestamp>, they seem to be in two waves: one at or before 2:00 PM Eastern Time (GMT-4) and another at or before 8:00 PM Eastern Time (GMT-4).

faq.header: I'm in the correct category and timeframe and should have the "rollout", but I don't?!
content: Don't be alarmed! It seems a lot of people are experiencing this issue!
No one really knows the root cause of it, however here are some tips:
-> Try logging out and logging back in
-> Try cold restarting Discord
-> Make sure you're up-to-date with the Discord client you're using.
-> Try another device / client
-> As the rollout seems to be gradually rolling out, you can try waiting up to 24-48 hours.
Discord is aware of the issue and their general support won't be able to help. There's not much you can do at this time otherwise...

faq.header: There are users who have it way after the date you list!
content: It may be possible, if one of the two conditions applies:

-> The user was apart of Rollout 0, which rolled the new system out for Discord Staff (and their personal accounts), Partners, Verified Server Owners, and some server owners with a certain revenue threshold.
-> The information provided here is somehow out of date. To avoid misinformation as much as possible, it may take a bit to update this page.

faq.header: How do I learn more about this change / is there another way of tracking?
content: To learn more, you can visit the official Discord support page: https://dis.gd/usernames.
I also suggest checking out hampuskraft's tracker where you can view anonymized user-submitted data to get an overview of where it's heading next! (Also, there's a neat graph too!)

faq.header: How often does this page update?
faq.content: The page reloads every 5 minutes (to save bandwidth, as well). This page will be updated carefully to avoid misinformation as much as possible.
Unless it shows up with something like (GMT-4), it's in your local timezone.

content: Short answer: No, but it is as much as we have, as a community.

Long answer: No, this is not in any way, shape, or form an official tracker. The content may be inaccurate (although at its best, I try to keep it accurate!). Because it is a community effort, the data collected to present on this page varies for sources, but mainly from the Discord Admins server.

faq.header: I want to report an issue / report a update / talk to you / etc...
faq.content: You can reach out to me via Discord at @%MAINTAINER_HANDLE%.

content: Discord will only consider you a "Nitro User" as long as all of the following are true:
-> You had Nitro on or before March 1st, 2023 AND continue to keep it until you receive the change (this applies for both gifted and purchased).
-> You got your Nitro back within the grace period (typically around 3 days), if you had lost it.
-> Your Nitro is NOT Nitro Basic (Nitro Classic will be honored, if you're wondering).
-> You do not have a Nitro Trial, as those were in May.
